attributes.action: i want to make aware people aware of what humans deserve so like human rights.
attributes.additional_details: make a 3 day weekend more bank holidays school holidays more longer as well
attributes.background: other animals such as dogs, cats and other pets just sit around all day eating ,sleeping and having the time of their life whereas humans have to go to school and work and have other things to attend this is too much stress therefore i’d like humans in the uk to have more free time.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
